rca_result.root_cause: Multiple infrastructure vulnerabilities detected: Auto Scaling launch template misconfiguration preventing instance launches, VPN redundancy loss creating network connectivity risks, and high-risk Kafka configuration with replication factor of 1
evidence: AWS_EC2_AUTOSCALING_LAUNCH_TEMPLATE_NOT_FOUND event indicates missing or deleted launch template
Multiple AWS_VPN_REDUNDANCY_LOSS events showing loss of VPN tunnel redundancy
AWS_KAFKA_HIGH_RISK_CONFIG_RF_EQUALS_ONE indicates Kafka replication factor set to 1
Multiple AWS_LAMBDA_PLANNED_LIFECYCLE_EVENT events indicating upcoming service changes
Pattern matches historical incidents with 0.67 confidence score

remediation.suggestion: Address critical infrastructure misconfigurations affecting Auto Scaling, VPN redundancy, and Kafka resilience
checklist: Verify and recreate missing Auto Scaling launch template with correct configuration
Check VPN connection status and restore redundant tunnels
Review Kafka cluster configuration and increase replication factor to at least 3
Monitor Lambda lifecycle events and plan for service transitions
Implement infrastructure monitoring to prevent similar configuration drift
